reviewText: I have always enjoyed novels set in the Victorian period, but I had no special interest in the period from an historical perspective.  Still, when a friend who ordered a bunch of the Great Courses at once mistakenly received two of this one, he offered the extra one to me.  Professor Allitt, a British professor who teaches at an American university, does a wonderful job of bringing this period of British--and world--history alive and making it interesting.  If you have any interest at all in world history, social customs, and so on, you can't help but enjoy this course.
